item.description:
Lucy Ann has graciously offered her crafting space for a meetup!!

Please join us for an evening of crafting fun. Bring your own project and meet some fellow crafters.

Lucy Ann' Crafting Space
138 Walker road (park across the street)
Swampscott, MA 01907
781-608-6395


Don't have a project but have an idea??? Drop me an email and I can help you get started with a project. Or check out my website www.stampwithmarilyn.com to check out card kits that I have available.

Looking forward to seeing you!!

Marilyn SanClemente
978-458-0729
www.stampwithmarilyn.com
marilyn.sanclemente@comcast.net
item.name: Paper Crafting in Swampscott
